import { Github, Linkedin, Mail, Phone } from 'lucide-react'; export default function About() { return (

About Me

I am a Computer Science graduate with hands-on experience in full-stack web and mobile development using MERN stack and React Native. I'm skilled in building and deploying machine learning models via Flask APIs on Hugging Face and Render.

My focus is on delivering real-world projects with practical, user-friendly solutions that solve meaningful problems. I enjoy combining my technical skills with creative problem-solving to build applications that make a difference.

kushalgupta8424@gmail.com
(+91) 8424813828
LinkedIn: Kushal Gupta
GitHub: kushal228030
); }
